content:
[detached HEAD 4dd1240144] BooleanAtom: delegate equality to Number for numeric comparisons
 1 file changed, 45 insertions(+)
From 4dd12401443bebdf3e209a623160e86bc8a59fba Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
From: openhands <openhands@all-hands.dev>
Date: Sat, 13 Dec 2025 15:35:56 +0000
Subject: [PATCH] BooleanAtom: delegate equality to Number for numeric
 comparisons


diff --git a/sympy/logic/boolalg.py b/sympy/logic/boolalg.py
index fbcba1f8d4..3b5939d918 100644
--- a/sympy/logic/boolalg.py
+++ b/sympy/logic/boolalg.py
@@ -196,10 +196,55 @@ def expand(self, *a, **kw):

     @property
     def canonical(self):
         return self

+    def __eq__(self, other):
+        """Equality comparison. Delegate to Number classes when appropriate
+
+        Ensures symmetry between Number and Boolean comparisons, e.g.
+        Float(0.0) == S.false and S.false == Float(0.0) agree.
+        """
+        try:
+            other = _sympify(other)
+        except Exception:
+            return NotImplemented
+        # If comparing to a Number, defer to the Number's equality so that
+        # Float/Number implementations handle numeric semantics (e.g. 0.0).
+        if isinstance(other, Number):
+            return other == self
+        # otherwise, fall back to structural equality
+        return Basic.__eq__(self, other)
+
+    def __ne__(self, other):
+        eq = self.__eq__(other)
+        if eq is NotImplemented:
+            return NotImplemented
+        return not eq
+    def __eq__(self, other):
+        """Equality comparison. Delegate to Number classes when appropriate
+
+        Ensures symmetry between Number and Boolean comparisons, e.g.
+        Float(0.0) == S.false and S.false == Float(0.0) agree.
+        """
+        try:
+            other = _sympify(other)
+        except Exception:
+            return NotImplemented
+        # If comparing to a Number, defer to the Number's equality so that
+        # Float/Number implementations handle numeric semantics (e.g. 0.0).
+        if isinstance(other, Number):
+            return other == self
+        # otherwise, fall back to structural equality
+        return Basic.__eq__(self, other)
+
+    def __ne__(self, other):
+        eq = self.__eq__(other)
+        if eq is NotImplemented:
+            return NotImplemented
+        return not eq
+
     def _noop(self, other=None):
         raise TypeError('BooleanAtom not allowed in this context.')

     __add__ = _noop
     __radd__ = _noop

extras.command: git -C sympy add sympy/logic/boolalg.py && git -C sympy commit -m "BooleanAtom: delegate equality to Number for numeric comparisons" --author="openhands <openhands@all-hands.dev>" || true; git -C sympy show --pretty=email -U5 HEAD > /tmp/sympy_patch.diff; sed -n '1,240p' /tmp/sympy_patch.diff
